long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus Tube: Your Distraction-Free Video Experience

Focus Tube is an innovative Chrome extension designed to enhance your video-watching experience by eliminating distractions. When you start watching a video, FocusTube allows you to input a specific time duration during which all other videos, including Shorts, will be blocked. This ensures that you can fully concentrate on the content you want to learn or enjoy.

With the flexibility to set your own time limit, FocusTube helps you immerse yourself in the video without the temptation to switch to unrelated content. Whether you're studying, working, or just enjoying a video, this extension allows you to maximize your focus and absorption of information.

Say goodbye to distractions and hello to a more productive viewing experience with Focus Tube!
